## Steps to reproduce

Ubuntu 14.04:
Install DSC for linux. 
Invoke InstallModule.py to install nx_1.0.zip
Install PowerShell 6.0.0 alpha.9
Invoke PowerShell and execute Get-DscResources
## Expected behavior

Get the DSC resource list
## Actual behavior

Failure:
You cannot call a method on a null-valued expression. 
...
## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable

```

comments.author: gaelcolas
comments.body:
Given the changes of DSC and pwsh, this issue should be closed.
(pwsh Invoke-DscResource only supports powershell DSC Resources).

title: Get-DscResource cannot list DSC resources
